Package uk.ac.rhul.cs2800

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Calculator
    Used to allow calculations of string expressions.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CalcModel
    Used as buffer to call both expression classes.
    Entry
    To dictate what the user inputs when using the calculator.
    GuiView
    G.
    NumStack
    Class used as a facade for reverse polish notation class on float values.
    OpStack
    Class used as a facade for reverse polish notation on symbols.
    RevPolishCalc
    The magic class of Reverse Polish Notation, here calculations are made using this notation.
    Stack
    The main Stack class where the magic happens (entries from user are stored).
    StandardCalc
    Where the expression is converted, reversed so that infix can be used inside the calculator.
    StrStack
    Separate class to be used as a facade on string values.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Symbol
    The Symbol class for all opcode of a calculator.
    Type
    Enum class to dictate what data type is being used whilst using the calculator.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    BadTypeException
    BadTypeException class used in all other calculator classes whenever the user inputs an incorrect value.
    InvalidExpression
    Thrown when the user enters an invalid expression into the calculator.
